Our Genes, Our Environment, Our Choice for Health

Dr. William Ryan Shelton, medical director and owner of Diet Doc Weight Loss Program reports….it's now scientifically more successful that our genes and environment together create the knowledge of life which we call the experience of reality.Health and disease are now seen as a continuum which an individual’s genes and environment interplay to determine who we are, the way you feel, how we live, and just how we die.For any one individual, either the genes or even the specific environment might be incompatible with health as well as life.As people we will have another influence which, assuming the genes and environment are not severely incompatible with one another, can drastically alter our reality of health insurance and illness: choice.Unfortunately, most of us do not believe our choices hold a whole lot of potential.
Study after study has shown that we not just possess the power to change our minds and behavior, we also have the power to improve our hormones, our neurotransmitters, the manner in which our brains are connected, our natureal defenses, our digestive systems, and so on.How we choose to live, that is certainly changing environmental surroundings our genes are exposed to, can and does change our body’s chemistry and function.The most commonly asked question I get regarding this problem is: “How long does it take?”Science is simply now starting to answer this.
Researchers from Princeton University are showing that it takes an average of Three months of consistent behavior change (making different choices) to get more detailed permanent habits to become formed.It has relevance for addictions, diet, exercise, stress reduction, etc.
Researchers from Harvard University are showing that it requires on average 2.5 hours per week for 10-12 weeks of behavior change practicing for additional permanent habits to become formed.
Researchers from all over the world have revealed in animal studies that it generally takes roughly the same as about a couple of weeks of recent gene/environment interplay for each year (equivalent) of gene/environment interplay which caused a chronic disease in order that physiologic changes for being permanent.
Surveys from physicians around the world reveal that for each year an individual has had a chronic disease, it normally takes 1-2 months for those symptoms to eliminate when treated.
The bottom line so far is that it's going to take initial persistence and determination and that changes of the permanent nature remember to develop.Of course relapses to old behavior always impede the process of recovery.

Diet Doc Weight Loss Program – Beginning of 2011 Special!

A SIZE to fits all yours needs or give as a gift to your family and friends! We feature MCT oil 8, 16 and 32 ounces.
MCT Oil
MCT oils occur naturally, and the most abundant source is coconut oil. Most MCT oil is refined from coconut oil.
MCT oil is interesting because, when it's metabolized in your body, it behaves rather more just like a carbohydrate than a fat. The fuel associated with preference for the entire body is carbohydrate, and the body will use up its store of carbohydrate before using other fuels. The body normally tries to keep fats we eat, but uses them as fuel if there is insufficient offered by carbohydrates; first it's going to make use of the fats in the food, and if these are insufficient it'll start to deplete body fat storage in our body tissue.
Unlike other fats, MCT oil doesn't go into the lymphatic system; instead it's transported directly to the liver where it is metabolized, so releasing energy quickly, just like a carbohydrate, and creating lots of ketones in the process.
MCT oil offers a quantity of advantages:
•Because it is fast acting, it can be used as a pick me up, for example giving additional MCT oil in the morning to enhance ketones quickly.
We use MCT oil to improve the overall ketone level, so that as a booster when ketones are low.
Coconut oil is not the same task as MCT oil, nor can coconut oil be utilized for an alternative.
Coconut oil has a mixture of both medium chain triglycerides (MCT) and long chain triglycerides (LCT). The body metabolizes MCTs much differently than LCT. Your body is required to usepancreatic digestive enzymes and bile to digest, absorb, and transport LCT. In contrast, MCT oil does not need pancreatic digestive enzymes and bile whatsoever. MCTs are readily digested and absorbed, and go straight to your liver to be used like a supply of energy. Because we drastically lessen the quantity of fat (short and long chain triglycerides) on the Slimxpress hCG weight loss program, it would be inappropriate to use coconut oil.
Why Should You Drink Water While On HCG Diet?
There are many reasons why you should stay hydrated, particularly if you are dieting:
•The procedure for burning calories requires an adequate supply of water in order to function efficiently; dehydration decelerates the fat-burning process.
•Burning calories creates toxins (think of the exhaust coming out of your vehicle), and water plays an important role in flushing them from your body.
•Dehydration leads to a reduction in blood volume; a decrease in blood volume causes a reduction in the supply of oxygen to your muscles; along with a reduction in the provision of oxygen to your muscles will make you feel tired.

South beach diet versus diet doc hCG diet

If you are an obese person trying to lose weight there is a great chance that you would know of the south beach diet. The south beach diet is just about like the Atkins diet; the primary emphasis in the south beach diet is on the proteins instead of carbohydrates. When a person consumes a greater area of protein, the body starts to have less response to carbohydrates; which can slow up the weight.
The south beach diet is divided into three phases. After each phases the individual can add some carbohydrates to his diet.
The south beach diet phase 1 focuses on decreasing the cravings of a person for carbohydrates. All of the carbohydrates are completely eliminated for that first phase which lasts Two weeks. It is assumed that after 2 weeks the cravings for carbohydrates will be controlled.
The problem with dietary fads is they only concentrate on reducing the water weight of the body and so when I person stops dieting he gains all the weight back.
Once you start the south beach diet you will start to see results within a couple weeks. However, when you stop dieting, you will notice excess fat increase rapidly. South beach diet might help you in losing weight fast however the weight loss won't be permanently.

Second Cycle is "activate," and resets your metabolism. The last cycle is "achieve," and aims that may help you develop proper eating habits and how to choose the best carbohydrates and also the
Fourth cycle, "arrive," combines all cycles and as an additional benefit provides you with a weekend break to enable you to eat a favorite food.

HCG Diet Plan --- How it works

HCG diet consists of human chorionic gonadotropin - a hormone which is often used in the process of weight reduction. The HCG hormone is naturally made by the cells during conception in the female body. The HCG weight loss diet plan raises the body’s natural procedure for metabolism in order that it loses weight at a extremely fast speed. The HCG diet hormones are administrated by injections as well as by HCG drops to improve the process of HCG weight loss inside a body.
